website_summaries.verdict: A foot massage pad with 2,800 points of therapeutic contact.
pros: Butterfly-shaped mat takes up little space
easily stow it away or pack it in a suitcase
Addresses foot pain in heel, ball, toes
cons: If you have tender or sensitive feet, you'll want to ease yourself onto this mat slowly

customer_reviews.title: Use it more than once
customer_reviews.text: Many reviews say the mat is way to hard on feet, but I completely disagree. The first few times I used it, it took some getting used to, but within a week, my feet were completely "broken in." I have suffered from plantar fasciitis in the past, so I continually try to stimulate my feet. This mat does the job. I actually wish it provided more stimulation.
customer_reviews.author: Wallys Mom

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I have bad flat feet and standing on this nightly has really helped my feet and legs feel better. Foot reflexology works. My feet are pretty tough so I don't wear socks when doing this, some people's feet are sensitive so try it with socks first then advance to no socks. Low price effective product, A+.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Berube

customer_reviews.title: Love standing on this
customer_reviews.text: My feet are often in pain, I read about this in a group for plantar fasciitis. When I first received it I could barely stand on it, now I can stand on it for quite some time. It has definitely helped with my pain.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaCK

customer_reviews.title: Feels good
customer_reviews.text: Hahahahahahaha. I bought this thing on a whim for my dad and ended up getting this one for myself. Me and the kids all love this thing. I don’t know if there’s any health benefit but it sure is fun to march on.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Atchison

customer_reviews.title: great purcahse
customer_reviews.text: massaging my feet well. I put it on a kitchen and office rug, So I am not sure about the suction. it works better when you wear socks. will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: step gingerly at first
customer_reviews.text: The mat is kind of cheaply made, but it seems to do the job intended. I like the option of different foot positions. It's a good thing for me to use, as I am always in footwear, and my feet get very "soft" and tender. I also think this helps with energy: I get out of bed and step on this mat for about a minute. And then I do it during the day also.
customer_reviews.author: R--

customer_reviews.title: feels great.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit to stand on this with full weight, but oh my! It feels so good and invigorating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: My Wife has chronic plantar fasciitis, she got this to step on when she first gets out of bed, it loosens her feet quickly!!! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanene Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive feet beware of pain
customer_reviews.text: Just to painful for my feet. Had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: DRE3

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this foot massager.. takes a few minutes to get used to..
customer_reviews.author: marge

customer_reviews.title: This is too large and bends in one place.  I believe it should be made of solid material.
customer_reviews.text: This is too large and bends in one place. I believe it should be made of solid material. Therefore only 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Reva

customer_reviews.title: Its very hard
customer_reviews.text: It's alot harder than I thought it would be. Kinda made my feet hurt more
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Chance

customer_reviews.title: Hard, so uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It was very hard and unbearable to stand on, even with socks,
customer_reviews.author: Meagan D.

customer_reviews.title: Gimmicky
customer_reviews.text: Gimmick, torture device. Nothing comfortable or relaxing anout this product. Hard plastic,really. Put tried achy feet on this, has better performance on a bumpy $2.00 welcome mat.
customer_reviews.author: song listener

customer_reviews.title: Mild foot massaging mat
customer_reviews.text: Loved the foot massager mat for its ability to provide relief from the muscle tension in my feet, only issue with it was that my feet require a deeper muscle massage than this massage mat can currently offer.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Pina

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend trying this product if you're trying to find relief ...
customer_reviews.text: I've included Futzuki Reflexology Mat in my daily routine for a few minutes in the morning and again in the evening. A year ago I had constant foot pain. Through a combined approach of sensible shoes with therapeutic inserts, stretching, massage and daily use of this mat, I seldom experience any discomfort. Immediately after using this mat, I notice a release in tension that allows my feet to relax. I would recommend trying this product if you're trying to find relief from foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: PBre

customer_reviews.title: No need to wear socks while using it.
customer_reviews.text: When my feet feels tired after a long day I like to relax my feet over it & stepping on it feels like a massage to your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Pop

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item immediately. It did not feel good AT ALL!
customer_reviews.author: cwill

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I could not stand on this for any time at all. so I got not benefit from it..
customer_reviews.author: Cora Whipple

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I like that it does what it says it's going to do and it took away the pain in my feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Evangelist

customer_reviews.title: Small. About 2" longer than my shoe inserts. ...
customer_reviews.text: Small. About 2" longer than my shoe inserts. Not effective at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stan
